Export Sales Codes

This is an example of a Sales Code download

    <?xml version="1.0"?>
    <ArrayOfSalesCode xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
      <Product xmlns:q2="KashFlow" xsi:type="q2:ProductsFull">
        <q2:ProductID>17387826</q2:ProductID>
        <q2:ProductName>Sale of goods</q2:ProductName>
        <q2:ProductCode>100</q2:ProductCode>
        <q2:ProductDescription />
        <q2:ManageStockLevels>0</q2:ManageStockLevels>
        <q2:QtyInStock>0</q2:QtyInStock>
        <q2:ProductPrice>0</q2:ProductPrice>
        <q2:subProducts>
          <q2:SubProduct>
            <q2:id>2747099</q2:id>
            <q2:ParentID>17387826</q2:ParentID>
            <q2:ParentCode>0</q2:ParentCode>
            <q2:Name>Blonde on Blonde</q2:Name>
            <q2:Code>BLONDE01</q2:Code>
            <q2:Description>1966 classic Blonde on Blonde from Bob Dylan.</q2:Description>
            <q2:Price>9.99</q2:Price>
            <q2:VatRate>0.0000</q2:VatRate>
            <q2:WholesalePrice>0.0000</q2:WholesalePrice>
            <q2:Managed>0</q2:Managed>
            <q2:QtyInStock>0</q2:QtyInStock>
            <q2:StockWarnQty>0</q2:StockWarnQty>
            <q2:AutoFill>1</q2:AutoFill>
          </q2:SubProduct>
          <q2:SubProduct>
            <q2:id>2748328</q2:id>
            <q2:ParentID>17387826</q2:ParentID>
            <q2:ParentCode>0</q2:ParentCode>
